name: Way before death
description:
Way before death is short isometric puzzle, where you have to keep your little Blant alive before the end. You have limited time, which increases with every completed level.

Game was made for Ludum Dare 50 Compo.

Made with:

  • Unity as game engine
  • Blender as 3D modelling tool
  • Reaper as sound design and music creation tool
  • Aseprite as texturing tool (somewhen).

Controls:

  • WS - move forward/backward
  • AD - turn right/left
  • Right/left arrow - move right/left
  • Enter - interaction

Game source code available here: https://github.com/ArseniyFilyushkin/Way-before-death
